page.title: 03DAIRY FARMING
page.content: {A DAIRY FARM The milking starts with the farmer cleaning the cows teats ready to fix on four rubber tubes.These tubes start to suck out the milk which then goes in to a small tub. When this small tub is full a van comes and the milk gets taken to the dairy.The cows that we saw getting milked are then put into a shed.The farmer told us how the cows dung gets stored in big containers. Then it gets sprayed in the fields. Dung helps the grass grow. The farmer then took us to see the calves.The farmer got the milk we gave them it in big plastic bottles.They were fast drinkers.Their mouths were watering because they liked the milk. We had to hold the bottles tight because they could pull the bottles out of our hands .We had a great time and we all wanted to take one home.
